item.title: Ffmpeg Bash Script
item.description: Using Ffmpeg is very effective way to convert video files for Youtube and Davinci Resolve. If you want to convert more than one video files a Bash script is very useful. Let’s create a converting script I am not a programmer but some times I need to create some scripts. So the script which we will create can be different that we create. First, we need to decide some variables:
